items.title: Motion Graphics & Video Editing Bootcamp
items.shortSummary: Noqo Motion Graphics & Video Editor! Mudo kooban ku baro Barnaamijyada ugu Caansan ee Lagu sameeyo muuqalada kala Duwan.
items.description:
Majeceshay inaad noqoto muuqaal sameeye! waxa ku diyaar ah tababar la xidhiidha samaynta nashqadaha "MOTION GRAPHICS & VIDEO EDITING BOOTCAMP"


wax aad ku baran doontaa tababarkan barnaamijyada ugu caansan ee suuqa kuwaasi oo lagu sameeyo muuqaalada kala duwan Sida. 


  • Adobe After Effects CC 2021
  • Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2021


Tababarkani wuxu noqon doonaa mid (Project Based) ah oo lagu bari doono sida loo sameeyo muuqaalada kala duwan kuwaasi oo la xidhiidha samaynta xaysiisyada , films-ka, Documentary films-ka iyo wixii lamid ah.


Sidoo kale tababarkani wuxu socon doonaa mudo 4 week-ga ah kaasi oo lagaa dhisi doono dhammaan qaybaha kala duwan ee Motion Graphics & Video Editing-ka, iyadoo ay kuula socdaan (Capstone Projects).


wixii faahfaahin dheeri ah kala xidhiidh WhatsApp numberka +252633220444

items.title: Web Design Bootcamp
items.shortSummary: Noqo Web Designer! oo baro sida loo nashqadeeyo Website iyo Web Apps-ka adigoo isticmaalaya Adobe XD, Figa una badal Web shaqaynaaya adigoo Isticmaalaya HTML & CSS!
items.description:
Ma Jeceshay inaad noqoto Website Designer hadii aad jeceshay inaad noqoto Web Designer dhamaystiran Tiigsi Technology wax ay kuu bilaabaysaa barashada Web Design Bootcamp-kam adigoo baran doona qaybaha kala duwan sida loo Design gareeyo Web Apps ka.

  • Adobe XD
  • Figma
  • HTML 
  • CSS  

Sidoo kale Web Design Bootcamp waxaad ku dhex baran doonta sida loo dhiso Real World Website, waxa kuula socda (Capstone Projects).


Mid ka mid ah faa'iidooyinka ugu muhiimsan ee Web Design Bootcamp ayaa ah in lagu bari doono qaabka loo Design gareeyo Website ama Web App ka intaanad qorin wax Code ah, taasi oo uu ku qanci karo qofka aad website-ka u samaynaysaa intaa la gaadhin Coding-ka.


Web Design Bootcamp ku wuxu soconayaa mudo 8 Week ah, sidoo kale Ardayda la qaadanaya waa tiro kooban.


wixii faahfaahin dheeri ah kala xidhiidh WhatsApp numberka +252633220444
